channel.title: (help) problems with whonix workstation image import
channel.description:
The Gateway xml worked fine but when I try to import the Workstation with:
virsh -c qemu:///system define Whonix-Workstation*.xml
Here is the error I see:
error: Failed to define domain from Whonix-Workstation-XFCE-16.0.3.7.xml error: unsupported configuration: unknown codec type ‘output’
can somebody give me a precise way or explanation on how to fix this? please
